summary: Highly motivated and detail-oriented customer service professional with over 5 years of experience in fast-paced, high-pressure environments. Possessing excellent communication and interpersonal skills, a strong ability to resolve conflicts, and a passion for delivering exceptional customer experiences. Seeking a challenging position where I can utilize my skills and experience to drive customer satisfaction and contribute to the success of the company.

workExperience.title: Customer Service Agent
workExperience.description: Handled incoming customer calls and supported service usage.
responsibilities: Managing large volumes of incoming calls in French
Assisting customers in using the company services
